fields.code:
let limit=1 # % USED SPACE LIMIT
DEVICE=`mount |grep " on /home "|awk '{print $1}'`
let used=`df -hl| grep $DEVICE| awk '{print $5}'|awk 'BEGIN {FS="%";} {print $1}'`
if [ $used -gt $limit ] ; then
  echo "The used space in /home [$DEVICE] is $used%."
  echo "ACTION: You must delete files"
fi
fields.name: LOW_HOME_PARTITION_SPACE
fields.description: add a fault when the space in home partition is low
